member.summary: Represents data passed to a procedure handling an event associated with a wizard finish page.

member.name: M:Divelements.WizardFramework.WizardFinishPageEventArgs.AddNameValuePair(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a pair of settings to the list displayed to the user.
member.param: The setting name.
The setting value.

remarks.para: By calling this method for every setting to add, you can present the options configured by the user in an intuitive manner at the end of the wizard.

member.name: T:Divelements.WizardFramework.FinishPage
member.summary: A page designed to show a summary of activity undertaken in the wizard process.

member.name: E:Divelements.WizardFramework.FinishPage.CollectSettings
member.summary: Occurs when the wizard needs to know all the settings configured by the user.

remarks.para: You should respond to this event by calling AddNameValuePair on the event arguments passed to the handling procedure as many times as is necessary to reflect the options chosen by the user.

member.summary: Prevents the window caption from being drawn.

member.summary: Prevents the system icon from being drawn.

member.name: F:Divelements.WizardFramework.Win32.WTNCA.NOSYSMENU
member.summary: Prevents the system icon menu from appearing.

member.name: F:Divelements.WizardFramework.Win32.WTNCA.NOMIRRORHELP
member.summary: Prevents mirroring of the question mark, even in right-to-left (RTL) layout.

member.summary: A mask that contains all the valid bits.

member.name: T:Divelements.WizardFramework.Win32.WTA_OPTIONS
member.summary: Defines options that are used to set window visual style attributes.

member.name: F:Divelements.WizardFramework.Win32.WTA_OPTIONS.dwFlags
member.summary: A combination of flags that modify window visual style attributes. Can be a combination of the WTNCA constants.

member.name: F:Divelements.WizardFramework.Win32.WTA_OPTIONS.dwMask
member.summary: A bitmask that describes how the values specified in dwFlags should be applied. If the bit corresponding to a value in dwFlags is 0, that flag will be removed. If the bit is 1, the flag will be added.

member.name: M:Divelements.WizardFramework.Wizard.SetPageOrder(Divelements.WizardFramework.WizardPageBase[],System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the PreviousPage and NextPage properties appropriately for all specified pages, assuming a linear progression through the array.
member.param: An array of wizard pages.
Sets the PreviousPage of the first page and the NextPage of the last page to null.

member.name: M:Divelements.WizardFramework.Wizard.SetPageOrder(Divelements.WizardFramework.WizardPageBase[])
member.summary: Sets the PreviousPage and NextPage properties appropriately for all specified pages, assuming a linear progression through the array.
member.param: An array of wizard pages.

member.name: M:Divelements.WizardFramework.Wizard.SetPageOrder(Divelements.WizardFramework.WizardPageBase,Divelements.WizardFramework.WizardPageBase)
member.summary: Configures a relationship between two wizard pages where the first navigates to the second, and vice versa.
member.param: The first page, that will navigate to the second page upon pressing Next.
The second page, that will navigate to the first page upon pressing Back.

member.name: T:Divelements.WizardFramework.WizardPageBase
member.summary: The base class from which all wizard pages derive.

remarks.para: You should not inherit from this class directly. Instead, inherit from either CoverWizardPage or WizardPage or their derivatives.

member.name: E:Divelements.WizardFramework.WizardPageBase.BeforeMoveNext
member.summary: Occurs when the user presses the Next button.

remarks.para: This event gives the developer the opportunity to validate the data entered on the page, and cancel the move if necessary.

member.name: E:Divelements.WizardFramework.WizardPageBase.BeforeMoveBack
member.summary: Occurs when the user presses the Back button.

remarks.para: This event gives the developer the opportunity to validate the data entered on the page, and cancel the move if necessary.

member.name: E:Divelements.WizardFramework.WizardPageBase.AfterDisplay
member.summary: Occurs after the page is displayed.

remarks.para: This event is only raised when moving foward, as it is assumed that when moving backward the page will need no configuration.

member.name: E:Divelements.WizardFramework.WizardPageBase.BeforeDisplay
member.summary: Occurs before the page is displayed.

remarks.para: This event is only raised when moving forward, as it is assumed that when moving backward the page will need no configuration.
